ComicInfo.Summary:
Time Trip to the Roman Empire: Using a time machine, Oil Can Harry spirits Pearl Pureheart away to the days of the Roman Empire.
The Booby Trap: Dinky sets a booby trap to catch a corn thief.
School Daze: Escaped criminals hide out in a schoolhouse. Mighty Mouse will have none of that!
Rolling Stones: Misfits Heckle and Jeckle are booted around the world by the angry citizens of many different countries, whom they annoy. They are literally kicked from one part of the Earth to another â€“ and finally find a similar reception on Mars!
Swat's the Matter with Gandy?: Gandy swats a fly -- on Sourpuss' noggin.
What a Night!: Mighty Mouse babysits for a little rabbit.
Toy Terrors: Heckle and Jeckle send life-size toy duplicates of themselves for a walk around the block - and live to regret it.
ComicInfo.Tags: Jeckle,Gandy Goose,Oil Can Harry,Dimwit,Dinky Duck,Mighty Mouse,Heckle,Pearl Pureheart,Sourpuss,Rudy the Rooster
